text: David Doyle (December 1, 1929 - February 26, 1997) is an American actor. He was born in Omaha, Nebraska. Doyle was best known for his role as John Bosley on the 1970s TV series Charlie's Angels. From 1991 to 1997, he voiced Grandpa Lou Pickles in the animated series Rugrats. Doyle died of a heart attack in Los Angeles on February 26, 1997 at the age of 67. ==Some movies== * Beethoven - Additional Voices * Bobby's World - Voice * Bonkers - W.W. Whacky * Foofur - Mel * Indiana Jones - George W. Bush * Quack Pack - Voice * Road Rovers - Professor Hubert * Rugrats - Grandpa Lou Pickles * TaleSpin - Sheriff Gomer * What-a-Mess - Santa Claus * Wild West C.O.W.-Boys of Moo Mesa - Additional Voices ==References== Category:1929 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska
title: David Doyle (actor)
